verses.text: And in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, I will \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* thee: though thou wast \w angry|strong="H0599"\w* with me, thine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* is turned \w away|strong="H7725"\w*, and thou \w comfortedst|strong="H5162"\w* me.

Behold, \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \add is\add* my \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*; I will \w trust|strong="H0982"\w*, and not be \w afraid|strong="H6342"\w*: for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*
d* 
d \+w JEHOVAH|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add is\add* my \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* and \add my\add* \w song|strong="H2176"\w*; he also is become my \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*.
Therefore with \w joy|strong="H8342"\w* shall ye \w draw|strong="H7579"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* out of the \w wells|strong="H4599"\w* of \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*.

And in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall ye \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Praise|strong="H3034"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w call|strong="H7121"\w* upon his \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w declare|strong="H3045"\w* his \w doings|strong="H5949"\w* among the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, make \w mention|strong="H2142"\w* that his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* is \w exalted|strong="H7682"\w*.\f + \fr 12.4 \ft callâ€¦: or, proclaim\f*

\w Sing|strong="H2167"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; for he hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* excellent \w things|strong="H1348"\w*: this \add is\add* \w known|strong="H3045"\w* in all the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

Cry \w out|strong="H6670"\w* and \w shout|strong="H7442"\w*, thou \w inhabitant|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*: for \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \add is\add* the Holy \w One|strong="H6918"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of thee.\f + \fr 12.6 \ft inhabitant: Heb. inhabitress\f*
